nodes.text: Ahoy there, ya scurvy scallawag, have ya gots me money ta play Poobah or do ya be soon hanging from the yardarms?
Um... Cap'n, we don't be having no yardarms no more.
No yardarms? What about the bowsprit?
Sorry, Cap'n, that's gone, too.
Never mind all that, then. Have ya got me money, ya lily-livered lyra-loving landlubber?
I found... er... plundered enough coin to play Poobah with you now, Captain.
Then I guess ya won't be hanging from me yardarm... er... whatever... just yet.
Um... I brought back some coins to play...
Ya don't be thinking that I be a cheap stakes, do ya? Ya don't be slandering me reputation like that and get away with it!
Ahoy, me buckos, grab this sorry son of a squid and he'll be tickled by the kitten!
Tickled by a kitten, Cap'n? Sounds a might bit lenient, as it were.
Don't ya know a colorful expression when ya be hearing it? It means "flog him with a cat o'nine tails."
Ah, aye-aye, Cap'n. A flogging we will have!
Avast, if it ain't the Poobah-playing porpoise puss. Did ya bring me some panda protection?
I've got just what you need!
Well, then, matey, let's deal some cards!
Um... but I'm afraid I don't quite have the Lyra to play.
Well, scupper me with a marlin spike - ya bring me me panda protection, but no Lyra to play Poobah?
Pity. I guess we'll just be taking that panda protection off your dead body, won't we, boys?
Get him, me buckos!
How about an amulet with Protection vs. Proaches or a magical ring?
Ya dare to come back here without a single bit of protection? Well, ya rat-breath rapscallion, no one cheats Captain Hoyle Bronson and lives to tell the tale.
Get him, me buckos!
Avast, mateys, here be another landlubber what wants to join us. Get him, ya maggot-infested rapscallions!
I, um...
Why ain't ya dead yet? Where be the scurvy knaves what's supposed to scupper ye with a marlin spike? The barnicle-bottomed blaggards ain't at their bloody posts!
Er... I just wanted...
First Mate!
Aye, Cap'n?
Where in Hades be the swill-sucking swine what man the reception committee?
Why, they be missing, Cap'n.
I can see that, ya blue-footed booby! So who's to deal with this new recruit?
Captain, I am trying to...
Seems like the lad be trying to speak to you, Cap'n. Mayhaps ye ask the boy ta say his last words?
Right. Well, what ye have to say for yourself before ye feed maggots, ya seasick sand-swimmer?

options.text: Challenge the Captain to a Game

nodes.text: I heard rumors that you were a betting man... er... zombie. I bet you I can beat you in a game of Poobah.
Ya hear that, First Mate? This barmy bilge rat challenged me - me! - to a Poobah game!
Aye, Cap'n, that he did!
Aye then, ya pasty poltroon, ya think ya can beat the likes of Captain Hoyle Bronson of the Royal Flush in a game of cards? Well, never let it be said that I turned down a sucker bet when I hear one.
You called the game, so I gets to name the stakes. If I win, you join me crew.
Sure. But if I win, I want the Captain's key.
So, it's me treasure ye be after. ya dirty, double-dealing dung-eater? I'll have ya keelhauled across the bow and dance the hempen jig from the crow's nest!
Ahem, Cap'n, it be hard to play cards once he be hanged. Dying takes a lot out of 'em.
Right... So first we play cards and then we have fun with this skinny, sallow-skinned bite of shark bait.
All right, ya pox-faced prawn, we'll play Poobah - but first, ya gots to make it worth me while to take this bet.
Ye'll need to show me ya gots the money for a high stakes game.
I have plenty of Lyra to play Poobah.
Good fer me, lad. Me treasure chest be a might peckish lately.
I have some Lyra...
Ya challenge Me to a Poobah game and not have the gold to back your bet? I don't be playing no penny-ante games!
Go pillage and plunder to raise enough stakes to bet - and don't come back without the booty!
But... but... how much do I need?
I don't be playing Poobah for anything less than a hundred and a half more of coin. Now, be off with ye and get me some treasure to add to me collection.

nodes.name: Poobah Money
nodes.description: I need to get more money before I can play Poobah with the Zombie Captain. Sounds like I need at least 150 Lyra to play.

options.text: Challenge the Captain to a Duel

nodes.text: I challenge you to a duel to the death!
To the death, ya say? Well, I guess I'll have to take ya up on that challenge, seeing as I have nothing to lose.

nodes.message: Move Shawn and Pirate Captain out of the court area into the clearing in front of it and begin combat.

nodes.text: Now then, before I'll be willing to take this bet, it's not enough that ye'll be betting your life. What need have I of another rotting Zombie crewmate or gold I'll never spend?

I'll be needing a special prize on the line. Ye'll need to bring me...
... some sort of protection against pandas!
Aye, Cap'n, that be a good one!
I've got just what you need!
Well, then, matey, let's deal some cards!
Um... protection from pandas? You're afraid of pandas?
Afraid? Captain Hoyle Bronson be not afeard of anything!
It's just that... well, we don't like to talk about it...
So tell me, ya slimy son of a Sea Serpent, do ye be having some protection or not?
Um... I think I left it behind in my wardrobe...
Then go get it - ya cod-brained collywopper! Don't be back without it or ye'll dance with Jack Ketch.

nodes.name: Poobah Panda Protection
nodes.description: I need to find something that protects agains pandas before I can play Poobah with the Pirate Captain. Who knew pirates fear pandas?
